[center][b][size=18pt]Panamac Server[/size][/b][/center]
CLIENT DOWNLOAD:[url=https://rapidshare.com/files/2061417346/Panamac%20Client.zip]Here[/url]
[center]Welcome to Panamac, an Old school type PKing and skilling server! has a great drop based economy, custom bosses, and tons of great minigames to play! No poorly coded project insanity here, just a clean entertaining 317 gameplay! [color=teal][b]ONLY 20MB CLIENT DOWNLOAD! MEANS FAST DOWNLOAD![/b][/color] Join now as we are a new server so you don't miss out! We are currently looking for staff too so maybe you can find a spot!
[b]Server Features[/b][/center] [b][center] [ul]Castles minigame -Old School Feel! -Donator Features -Active PK -Tons of Bosses! -Tons of Skills -Lots of minigames -Full Fight pits -Full Pest Control -Custom Interfaces -100% Clan chat with ranks -Level Up Interfaces -2 Quests, Dragon Slayer and Simple Man's Dream -Duel arena 100%[/ul] [/center][/b]

item.title: Panamac Oldschool 317 [24/7 uptime]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

thxtowarrior:

Well i did make my own pictures. Just because 3 of them aren’t mine but of features of something i have on my server doesnt make me a bad owner lol. Its funny how you assume someone is a bad owner because of that. But i still appreciate your feedback. I will try not to use someone else’s pictures next time.

He’s not saying you’re bad, but rather that you’re probably really lazy and half-arsed everything when coding it considering you were to lazy to take 20 seconds out of your time to make your own image. It’s kind of like a kid doing his homework, if he slacks off in one area it’s more than likely going to reflect his work in other areas as well.

[quote=“arham 4, post:21, topic:458356”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=561278.msg4095433#msg4095433 date=1346790267]
Saying need staff is the worst way of advertising. It only brings you 10 year old staff hunters. Anyways good luck. Owner doesn’t seam nice so not joining.
[/quote]
Y U ALL HATE 10 YEAR OLDS![/quote]

Read full topic
